title: Dreams and Night Terrors - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/3/22
itunes:title: Dreams and Night Terrors - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/3/22
description:
George Noory and sociologist Michael Sebastian discuss his research into dreams, how people may suffer from night terrors and die in their sleep, and recounts the story of how he had a dream about his future wife years before meeting her in person.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An exploration into the power of dreams to give you insight into life.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
